text: avaril oru vibhagam innane parannatearkkuka: "allahu nissesam nasippikkukayea allenkil kathinamayi siksikkukayea ceyyanirikkunna janatte ninnalentin upadesikkunnu?” avar marupati parannu: "ninnalute nathanre atutt nannal badhyata niraverriyittuntenn n'yayam beadhippikkan. oruvela avar suksmatayullavarayekkamallea.”
